original_text: It is not God who has caused you to change what you believe. No! God is the one who has chosen you to serve him.
korean_text: 그 권면은 너희를 부르신 이에게서 난 것이 아니니라

sentences.original_text: It is not God who has caused you to change what you believe
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 당신이 믿는 것을 바꾸게 한 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: God is the one who has chosen you to serve him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 당신을 그분을 섬기도록 선택하신 분이십니다
